sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǔzhòu shì wúxiàn de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'univers est infini.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The universe is infinite.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàtiān chī xīguā zuì shuǎng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Manger de la pastèque en été est le plus rafraîchissant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Eating watermelon in summer is the most refreshing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīng'ér zài xī nǎipíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le bébé tète son biberon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The baby is sucking the bottle.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ jìnzhǐ xīyān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est interdit de fumer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking is prohibited here.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这部电影吸引了很多观众。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù diànyǐng xīyǐn le hěn duō guānzhòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce film a attiré beaucoup de spectateurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This movie attracted many viewers.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuǐ yóu qīng hé yǎng zǔchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'eau est composée d'hydrogène et d'oxygène.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī xìliè de huódòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une série d'activités.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a series of activities.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xià gè yuè yào chūchāi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois voyager pour le travail le mois prochain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have a business trip next month.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xìtǒng hěn xiānjìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce système est très avancé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This system is very advanced.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zhùyì měi yī gè xìjié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez faire attention à chaque détail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pay attention to every detail.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè gēn xiàn hěn xì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce fil est très fin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This thread is very thin.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā sònggěi tā yī shù xiānhuā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il lui a offert un bouquet de fleurs fraîches.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He gave her a bouquet of fresh flowers.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè dào cài tài xián le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plat est trop salé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This dish is too salty.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā láizì yī gè xiǎo xiànchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il vient d'une petite ville de district.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He comes from a small county town.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù yǒu sùdù xiànzhì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route a une limitation de vitesse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road has a speed limit.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo yú hěn xiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce poisson est très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This fish is very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 两种颜色形成鲜明的对比。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng zhǒng yánsè xíngchéng xiānmíng de duìbǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux couleurs forment un contraste frappant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The two colors form a sharp contrast.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen xiāngchǔ de hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils s'entendent très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They get along very well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de jìnbù fēicháng xiǎnzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses progrès sont très remarquables.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His progress is very remarkable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàjì shì lǚyóu wàngjì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'été est la haute saison touristique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Summer is the peak tourist season.
